response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I propose a special introductory price of $12,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your requirements, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12500}
